stimulusHtml: An object is traveling across a flat horizontal surface with a constant velocity v when a net force of magnitude F is exerted on the object. In which of the following cases does the kinetic energy of the object remain constant?
choicesHtml: The force is exerted at less than 90∘ from the direction of the velocity.
The force is exerted in in the same direction as the velocity.
The force is exerted in the opposite direction as the velocity.
The force is exerted 90∘ from the direction of the velocity.
